snippet: If you’re not satisfied with the quality of music produced by your smartphone’s player, there are plenty of options a sharper listening experience.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column compares audio enhancement applications for smartphones; notes that Runtastic has made available Sleep Better app that assesses users' sleep behavior to help them sleep better.
lead_paragraph: If you’re not satisfied with the quality of music produced by your smartphone’s player, there are plenty of options a sharper listening experience.

headline.print_headline: No Need to Settle for Standard Smartphone Sound
headline.main: Audio Equalizer and Enhancement Apps Beyond the Smartphone Sound
